mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment.basicPitchLcsAligner

Class Aligner

  • java.lang.Object
    • mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment.basicPitchLcsAligner.Aligner

  • public class Aligner
extends java.lang.Object
    Code for aligning a score contained in an Alignment object (and updating the alignment accordingly) with a given sequence of notes.

      Represents a pair of alignments.

      • processWithProgress

        public void processWithProgress(Alignment alignment,
                                java.util.List<Transcriber.NoteEventWithTime> ns,
                                java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void> onLabel,
                                java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Void> onProgress,
                                java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void> onDone)
        The main transcription method.
        Parameters:
        alignment - The Alignment object that is to be updated*
        ns - The list of Transcriber.NoteEventWithTime objects
        onLabel - A callback function that is called to display status information
        onProgress - A callback function that is called to update the progress bar
        onDone - A callback function that is called on transcription completion

      • getLocalAvgPerfScoreRatio

        private double getLocalAvgPerfScoreRatio(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> noteTimes,
                                         java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double> chordCenters,
                                         java.util.List<java.lang.Long> times,
                                         int i,
                                         int radius)
        Calculates the local average performance score ratio.
        Parameters:
        noteTimes - a list of note times
        chordCenters - a tree map of chord centers
        times - a list of times
        i - the index to calculate the ratio at
        radius - the radius to use for the calculation
        Returns:
        the local average performance score ratio

      • longestCommonSubsequence

        private static Aligner.AlignmentPair longestCommonSubsequence(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> a,
                                                              java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> b,
                                                              java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Void> onProgress)
        Calculates the longest common subsequence of two lists of integers.
        Parameters:
        a - the first list of integers
        b - the second list of integers
        onProgress - a function to call with the progress of the calculation (0.0 - 1.0)
        Returns:
        an alignment pair containing the longest common subsequence
